name: CafeSounds
0:
”Alexa open Cafe Sounds”
”Alexa ask Cafe Sounds to play for 8 hours”
”Alexa, pause”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cafe sounds
des:
Cafe Sounds is an immersive Alexa skill designed to bring the vibrant ambiance of a coffee shop right into your home or workspace. Perfect for those who miss the bustling atmosphere of their favorite café or need a stimulating background noise to boost productivity. From the gentle clatter of coffee cups and soft murmur of conversations to the subtle sounds of baristas crafting beverages, each soundbite is carefully curated to create an authentic cafe experience. Whether you're reading, studying, working, or simply relaxing, Cafe Sounds provides the perfect auditory backdrop to enhance focus or unwind. Activate this skill to envelop yourself in the cozy, inviting atmosphere of a cafe, no matter where you are.

1. On Alexa app, navigate to Routines.
2. Click + to add a new routine.
3. Click + for "When this happens" and choose one.
4. Click + for "Add action" and choose "Skills".
5. Choose "Your Skills" and select Cafe Sounds
6. Choose Device to perform the routine and save.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
